391610.name: H-Hour: Worlds Elite - Weapon Skins Pack
391610.description:
This is a double pack of Weapon skins for the base game H-Hour: World's Elite. Show up on the battlefield using one or more of your 10 special weapon skins and stand out in the crowd. Add some personality to select weapons or just grab the most outrageous ones and blind the enemy with your bling. Make yourself a target and then disappoint the enemy who try to take you down so they can pick up your special weapon for the duration of the match.

The pack includes:

1) AssaultRifles/AR_AK47 - "Tribal"
2) AssaultRifles/AR_AK74 - "JackHammer"
3) AssaultRifles/AR_BP85 - "SgtMajor"
4) LightMachineGuns/LMG_MK46 - "FearNoEvil"
5) LightMachineGuns/LMG_RPK - "GoldDragon"
6) LightMachineGuns/LMG_RPK - "Iron_Dragon"
7) SniperRifles/SR_Dragunov - "Widowmaker"
8) SniperRifles/SR_L96 - "CombatCamo"
9) SniperRifles/SR_SR25 - "Army Sniper"
10) SubmachineGuns/SM_UZI - "JackHammer"
391610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
